org.honton.chas.datadog.apm

Class SpanBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.honton.chas.datadog.apm.SpanBuilder

  • public class SpanBuilder
extends Object
    An active Span builder. Provides methods to get and set the Span attributes. Some attributes, such as the start time, traceId, parentId, and traceId are final and cannot be modified.

        Create a builder for a span which is a child of another span.

        parentSpanId - The id of the parent span

        Parameters:

        Returns:
